companies.name: Alan
companies.description: France's first digital health insurance company offering integrated health insurance, mental wellbeing (Alan Mind), and an AI-powered medical assistant to over 1 million members across France, Belgium, Spain, and Canada.

companies.name: YuLife
companies.description: UK-based gamified employee insurance and wellbeing platform that rewards healthy habits like walking and meditation with YuCoin, redeemable for vouchers and charitable donations.

companies.name: Spectrum.Life
companies.description: Dublin-based digital health and EAP provider offering clinically-led mental health, wellbeing, and work-life support services to insurers, workplaces, and educational institutions.

companies.name: Spring Health
companies.description: AI-powered EAP and mental health platform that matches employees with personalised treatment plans spanning self-help, coaching, therapy, and crisis support.

companies.name: Lyra Health
companies.description: Clinical-grade workplace mental health platform blending in-person and virtual therapy with digital tools, delivering a 26% reduction in healthcare claim costs for clients.

companies.name: Unmind
companies.description: Science-based workplace mental health platform used by large enterprises to provide proactive wellbeing tools, clinical assessments, and guided support across all organisational levels.

companies.name: Spill
companies.description: Slack-integrated EAP and mental health platform designed for digital-first teams, providing discreet, fast access to therapy and emotional support within daily workflows.

companies.name: Betterfly
companies.description: Purpose-driven wellbeing and insurance platform that converts employees' healthy habits into growing life insurance coverage and charitable donations, operating across Latin America and Europe.

companies.name: Modern Health
companies.description: Global EAP and mental wellness platform offering a continuum of care from self-guided digital resources and coaching to clinical therapy, serving enterprise workforces worldwide.

companies.name: Nilo Health
companies.description: European mental health platform offering preventive, multilingual psychological support for workplaces with a focus on early intervention and localised care across EU markets.
